svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/141.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="28.2.5"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="qNBOc6oTU5kkE3cIxCQr"> <mxGraphModel dx="786" dy="463" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="850" pageHeight="1100" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="EAhdQ9fsyIraDOZ5cVeO-6" value="" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="40" width="110" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EAhdQ9fsyIraDOZ5cVeO-2" value="Client" style="shape=umlActor;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;html=1;outlineConnect=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="50" width="30" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EAhdQ9fsyIraDOZ5cVeO-3" value="Supplier" style="shape=umlActor;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;html=1;outlineConnect=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="50" width="30" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EAhdQ9fsyIraDOZ5cVeO-7" value="Users" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="85" y="10" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EAhdQ9fsyIraDOZ5cVeO-11" value="" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="180" width="280" height="280" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EAhdQ9fsyIraDOZ5cVeO-8" value="Supplier" style="shape=umlActor;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;html=1;outlineConnect=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="90" y="280" width="30" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EAhdQ9fsyIraDOZ5cVeO-9" value="<ul><li>Register</li><li style="">Post&nbsp;</li><ul><li style="">time slots</li><li style="">period (duration of rent)</li><li style="">price</li><li style="">images</li><li style="">description (specifications of a car like year, engine, etc..)</li><li style="">special requirements (years of driving, deposit, ...)</li></ul><li style="">View rent requests&nbsp;</li><li style="">Accept/decline (message on decline - optional)</li><li style="">**Fedback (daca am timp)</li></ul>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="205" width="230" height="230" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EAhdQ9fsyIraDOZ5cVeO-16" value="" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="490" y="180" width="280" height="280" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EAhdQ9fsyIraDOZ5cVeO-14" value="Client" style="shape=umlActor;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;html=1;outlineConnect=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="520" y="280" width="30" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EAhdQ9fsyIraDOZ5cVeO-15" value="<ul><li>Register (Login with google or facebook), give all necessary acts</li><ul><li>Validation process(can't request motorbikes with a certain power, based on driving licence)</li></ul><li style="">View posts</li><li style="">Request rent&nbsp;</li><li style="">Search (marca masina, zona, price, timeslot (**daca am timp))</li><li style="">Notifications (accepted/rejected request) - signalR (**ask vanea)</li><li style="">**Feedback (daca am timp)</li></ul>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="540" y="215" width="230" height="230" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EAhdQ9fsyIraDOZ5cVeO-17" value="Supplier can be client" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="185" y="80" width="120" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EAhdQ9fsyIraDOZ5cVeO-18" value="Technical aspects:<div><br><div><ul><li>Register/Login:</li><ul><li>Needs to have roles</li><li>OAuth (third party authentification, simple, **not my login/register implementation) -&gt; gives token</li><li>Keycloack (identity service - free, hard to configure, vanea has experience, has dashbord)</li><li>Microsoft Identity (more backendy)</li></ul><li>Frontend (Visual Studio Code):</li><ul><li>Vue.js - simpler and more straightforward</li><li>Quasar (bazat pe Vue.js) - ui features (templates), progressive web app (feels like native application on phone)</li></ul><li>Backend:</li><ul><li>Minimum API / Standard API (not language related)</li><li>MVC (Visual Studio)</li><li>Request accept/reject:</li><ul><li>Email (free smtp servers for sending emails, smtp4dev - doar local)</li><li>Notificari pe site (fara email)</li></ul><li>ORM:&nbsp;</li><ul><li>Entity Framework (for .Net, don't need to create the models in database, can create it in application and through migrations to move to DataBase)</li><li>SqlAlchemy (for python)</li></ul></ul><li>DataBase:</li><ul><li><b>PostgreSql</b> (Entity Framework are adaptor), dbeaver pentru conectarea la DB</li><li>SqlServer</li><li>MongoDB (document based database)</li></ul></ul></div></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="500" width="370" height="510" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EAhdQ9fsyIraDOZ5cVeO-19" value="To Dos:<div><ul><li>Stabilirea bazei de date</li><li>Stabilirea limbajului pentru backend</li><li>Autentificarea poate fi la urma(cat nu e adaugat, fac ceva simplu)</li></ul></div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;align=left;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="490" y="500" width="180" height="180" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;

ul.li: Register (Login with google or facebook), give all necessary acts
Validation process(can't request motorbikes with a certain power, based on driving licence)
Search (marca masina, zona, price, timeslot (**daca am timp))

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 85px; margin-left: 126px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 368px; height: 1px; padding-top: 745px; margin-left: 2px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Technical aspects:
Register/Login:
Needs to have roles
OAuth (third party authentification, simple, **not my login/register implementation) -> gives token
Keycloack (identity service - free, hard to configure, vanea has experience, has dashbord)
Microsoft Identity (more backendy)
Frontend (Visual Studio Code):
Vue.js - simpler and more straightforward
Quasar (bazat pe Vue.js) - ui features (templates), progressive web app (feels like native application on phone)
Backend:
Minimum API / Standard API (not language related)
MVC (Visual Studio)
Request accept/reject:
Email (free smtp servers for sending emails, smtp4dev - doar local)
Notificari pe site (fara email)
ORM:
Entity Framework (for .Net, don't need to create the models in database, can create it in application and through migrations to move to DataBase)
SqlAlchemy (for python)
DataBase:
PostgreSql (Entity Framework are adaptor), dbeaver pentru conectarea la DB
SqlServer
MongoDB (document based database)

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 580px; margin-left: 432px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
To Dos:
Stabilirea bazei de date
Stabilirea limbajului pentru backend
Autentificarea poate fi la urma(cat nu e adaugat, fac ceva simplu)
